text:
guys i also want to share something...mai pichle sal lalbaug gya tha ganpati
ka bahot passion h to mai sari ganpatiyo ki pictures le raha tha ek lady
bhaddi si facevali fast fast aa rahi thi usko mera pair lag gya kyuli mai
photo kheechte hue piche backstep liya to usko mera ek pair laga usne muje
apne mobile ke angle se aankh me mara mera aakh ke niche laga aur bahot blood
nikal raha tha...muje samjh nai aaya mai situation ko kaise handle karu par
phir b mai uske piche piche gya aur raste me jitne police vale the sbko bola
but sb muje bhaga diya..uska bad muje 5 se 6 police ke bad muje lady police
mili maine vo bhaddi aurat ka bag pakda hua tha kyuki vo bhag rahi thi aur
lady police ko pura bataya aur questioning me lady police ko b pata chal gya
galti kiski h phir usne bola wait karo saheb aa rahe h saheb aaye us bhaddi
aurat ne bola muje isne kamar pe hath lagaya us police vale ne mujse kuch
poocha b nai halaki mai cute sa 21 age ka hu par pata nai police vale ko mujme
wahsi ya havsi dikh raha tha usne mera color pakad liya aur bolne laga thane
chal itne me vo gandi shakal vali aurat nikal gyi phir 1 mint bad us lady
police ne use samjhaya police vale ko to usne police ne bola beta jaan bhoojh
ke maine aisa kiya nai to tuje vo phasa deti police station me aur tu hi
phasta last me dekha kaisa palti mari isliye aur usne kaha muje starting se
pata tha teri galti nai h.  
uske bad maine chilla chilla kar police valo ko bahot sunaya gusse me but meri
izzat ki laude lag chuke the.  
edited :- (usko bad me doobdhne nikala tha gusse me socha patthar mar ke sir
phod deta hu but crowd ke wajah se mili nai..aur next day ye b soch raha tha
agle din jau aur cctv phootage nikalvau but himmat nai hui ab mai itna dar gya
hu ki unknown ladkiyo se bat tak nai karta hu.)

vaapis aane main let ho gayi thi. to ghar vaale dhundne lage the usko. baccho ne bataaya ki
wo us vaali gali main uske saath khud gaadi main baithkar gayi he hamane dekha tha. ye to hamane
bhi dekha tha ki wo khudd hi maaruti car main baithkar gayi thi ham tab chote bachche the. ye
baat fail gayi thi. jab ladki vaapis aayi to gharavaalon ne rape kii baat kah di. medical main
pruf ho gaya ki sex kiya he. wo ladkaa jail gaya ladke ke baap kii kuch din main maut
ho gayi. ladki ke ghar vaale kuch maheene baad hi duusare shahar chale gaye. lekin ladke kii
jindagi barbaad ho gayi. jhooth cese tha ye rape kaa. sabhi jaanate hai iske bare main.

h!

and yr!  
respect hamesha kisi particular gender ko mt do!  
respect hamesha human ko do!  
nor male nor female!  
only humanity!  
jha agar ladka koi galt kaam krta h! usse hm slap krte h!

text:
main khud bhi iskaa shikaar hum, 2018 main main bhi jhuthe aarope main 5 maheene kii sazaa kaati
he . abhi bhi cese chal rahaa he..jail bhari padi hai in jhuthe keson se .. balig ladki ko
naaballig bataa kar cese darj karavaate hai 5-5 saal sunwaayee nahi he ... pocso cese main
bail nahi mil rahi, andar hi andar sazaa ho jaati he . maine jo dekha he uske aadhaar par
kah saktaa hoon ki sirf 5% cese sach hai baaki sab jhuthe cese hai . ladkiyaan apni marzi
se ghar se bhaagti hai, sambandh banaati hai jab pakadi jaati hai to ghar waalon ke dabaav main
jhuthe cese darj karwaati hai .. badale kii bhaavana se paisa luutane ke bahaane se jhuthe cese
darj karwaati hai . kai ladke to 5/10/15 lakh dekar compromise karke nikle hai . mere
khud ke cese main ladki ke saath mere sambandh 6 saal se the par uske gharavaalon ko jab pataa
chalaa to ladki ko mere khilaaf karne ke liye uski maa ne bhi aarope lagaaya ki mere saath
bhi rape kiya he . 2.5 karod kaa lut kaa maamla bhi darj kara diya ki tantra mantra puja
paath ke naam se 2.5 karod rupee anth liye 3 kilo sona le liya . achche se achche dhani
seth bhi ghar main 3 kilo sona nahi rakhte or 2.5 karod kii puja nahi karavaate .... is sab
main police ne bhi unka saath diya ... apane rasookh ke dam par thane main report na kara kar
sidhe sog main maamla darj karavaaya jabaki ye sog kaa cese hi nahi hota . mujhe itnaa
torchar karavaaya jisaki koi kalpana bhi nahi kar saktaa ... unka makasad tha mujhe 10-20 saal
ke liye andar karvaa dena or jisaki unhone puri koshish bhi kii .... par bhagwaan mere
saath tha ki bel mil gai or mujhe yakeen he ki court main wo parivaar jhootha sabit hoga
... par meri zindagi to kharaab ho gai meraa sara vyapaar khatm ho gaya ... meri itani
badanaami hui jisaki koi had nahi ... paisa dekar unhone akhabaaron main aise aise jhooth
bole or chhapavaye hai ki kya bataaun .... jhuthe cese darj hone kaa sabase bada kaaran ye
bhi he ki ladki kii identity chhupai jaati he ... unako pataa hota he ham logon ke naam
pate to akhbaar main aayenge nahi isaliye bekhauf rahati hai .... yaa to jab tak ladkaa doshi
sabit na ho jaye tab tak ladke kii identity chhupai jaani chaiye . yaa donon kii
saarvajanik honi chaiye ...agar aisa ho jaye to 70-80% cese darj hi nahi honge .
doosraa ksharan ye he ki cese ke baad agar ladke ke paksh main faisla jaataa he to ladkaa
manahani kaa cese ladki or uske parivaar par nahi kar saktaa kyonki ladke ko andeh yaa
sabooton ke abhaav main bari kiya jaataa he jiske kaaran ladkaa manahani kaa cese nahi karata
agar ye kanoon ban jaye ki ladki juthi sabit hui to usko bhi utani sazaa milegi to 90%
cese to darj hi nahi honge . 6-7 saal jail main rahane ke baad agar ladkaa bari bhi ho jaataa
he to kya phayda ? uski jindagi to kharaab ho gai na ? maine kai cese aise dekhe hai ki
jisamen agar ladkaa doshi sabit hota he to use 10 saal kii sazaa honi hoti he par 7-8
saal baad ladkaa jail main rahakar agar bari ho gaya to bhi puri sazaa to usne kaat lee ... phir
bari kaa kya matlab rah jaayegaa ? ladki to aarope laga kar ghar baith jaati he uski duniya
main to koi fark nahi padataa ... ladkaa bechaara or uskaa parivaar mare sirf isaliye kii
usne ladki se pyaar kiya ? yaa to cese lagane ke saath bel kaa praavdhaan ho phir jo bhi
doshi sabit ho usko sazaa mili par aisa hindustan main kuch bhi sambhav nahi he . yahaan
kanoon hi lachar he police bhrasht he to aam aadmi to sirf mar hi saktaa he .

ho? ladko ko jobs ni de rahe private school, colleges, kuch sectors etc ladka
bhale hi jyaada talented ho but chance ladki ko milta he... meri age 21 he
madhya pradesh ke chhoti si city sagar se, abhi graduate hone se pehle 8 jagah
job confirm hone ke baad... sirf is liye reject kar diya call karke kyuki
"humaare yahaa ladki ki zaroorat hai" abhi i'm an rj but first preference unki
bhi ladki hi thi... us ladki ko wo job dene ko taiyyar he jise customers se
deal karna nahi aata but lambe experience waale bande ko nahi... computer cafe
per unko ladki baithana he "sundar hona chahiye yarr" , reception per sirf
ladki, surveying ke liye ladki... har jagah ladki... men's are not acceptable
in our generation. hum women empowerment chahte he magar uske naam per hum
road per bheekh to ni maangne lagege naa ...

text:
indian judiciary ke loopholes ko highlight karne ke liye kisi na kisiko apni
life khoni padti hai. jab nirbhaya case hua tab inn kale coat wale haramiyo ke
dimag me baat aayi ki ek 17 saal ka ladka bhi rape kar sakta hai. aur jab
sarabjit wala case hua tab ja kar baat samjh aayi ki ladki jhoot bhi bol sakti
hai. problem yeh hai ki hum ek bohot hi 3rd class system ke gulam hai.
